Variable.Name: fds_SC2
Variable.Value: OBJECT2( ue_FDI_IDOReplicationMapFields( CA(RNCSDVIOG) OBJNAME(sReplicationMapFields) FILTERPERM(RuleNum = FP(RuleNum)) ORDERBY(FieldSeq ASC) LOCKMODE(Row) ) )

ScriptLines.ScriptLine: Dictionary<string, Dictionary<string, List<string>>> config = new Dictionary<string, Dictionary<string, List<string>>>()
List<string> optionKeys = config.ContainsKey(ruletargetType) ? config[ruletargetType]["OptionKeys"] : new List<string>();
